title: Jeff Garlin Describes the Making of ‘Curb Your Enthusiasm’ (Ep. 191)
description:
The Ringer’s Chris Ryan and Andy Greenwald catch up on life and airplane movies they watched during their recent travels, including ‘Assassin’s Creed’ and ‘The Big Sick’ (1:00). Then Andy sits down with Jeff Garlin to discuss the new season of ‘Curb Your Enthusiasm’ and the process of making it (17:00).

      
Learn more about your ad choices. Visit podcastchoices.com/adchoices
